shortdesc.ph: Sets the format of the captured raw audio data.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setRecordingAudioFrameParameters( int sampleRate, int channel, int mode, int samplesPerCall);
virtual int setRecordingAudioFrameParameters(int sampleRate, int channel, RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_TYPE mode, int samplesPerCall) = 0;
public abstract int SetRecordingAudioFrameParameters(int sampleRate, int channel, RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_TYPE mode, int samplesPerCall);
Future<void> setRecordingAudioFrameParameters( {required int sampleRate, required int channel, required RawAudioFrameOpModeType mode, required int samplesPerCall});

section.p: Sets the audio format for the callback.

ul.li: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the samplesPerCall, sampleRate and channel parameters set in this method.Sample interval = samplePerCall/(sampleRate × channel). Ensure that the sample interval ≥ 0.01 (s). The SDK triggers the callback according to the sampling interval.
